org.lwjgl.system.glfw

Interface MonitorCallback


  • public interface MonitorCallback
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the SetMonitorCallback method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MonitorCallback.Util 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void invoke(long monitor, int event)
      This method will be called when a GLFW monitor event occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        void invoke(long monitor,
          int event)
        This method will be called when a GLFW monitor event occurs.
        Parameters:
        monitor - the monitor that was connected or disconnected
        event - one of GLFW.GLFW_CONNECTED or GLFW.GLFW_DISCONNECTED
